title: Podcasts are Confession - EP3
description:
Hey Babe! is a podcast where comedians Chris Distefano and Sal Vulcano share stories and have fun. Let your hair down & come hang out with the BABES!


This episode the BABES talk : Who has the uglier feet Sal or Chris, Chris’ Dad moves to Florida without telling him and his mom goes on trip to Paris alone without saying anything, Being born damaged, Chris has doctors on call doing bizarre things to him, 98 Degrees and the time Chris broke into Nick Lachey’s apartment, Chris went alone to Edinburgh Scotland, Sal has never seen Shrek or any Pixar movies, watching a movie for first time with your kid, how awesome newcastle England is, Jet Blue is DOPE and goes to London now, Chris pretends his step mother died so he could leave England early to see his kid, is it weird to bring masturbation up to priests during confession, how hard it is to become a priest, Sal sleeps with 6 pillows, priests can’t tell cops confessions or they get cancelled by the pope, is it possible to fart holes in underwear?, Chris keeps an audio diary of all his farts, and of course an episode of HEY BABE! Wouldn’t be complete without chatting about Saratoga peanut butter.


Follow The Show!


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/heybabepod/ 


Twitter - https://twitter.com/heybabepod 


Follow us!


Chris Distefano


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/ 


Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy 


Website - https://www.chrisdcomedy.com/ 


Sal Vulcano


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/salvulcano/ 


Twitter - https://twitter.com/SalVulcano 


Website - https://salvulcanocomedy.com/ 


Our Producer TheHomelessPimp


https://www.instagram.com/thehomelesspimp/


 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
